data.title: El Topo (Original Motion Picture Score)
data.meta_description: El Topo is the landmark cult film classic credited with launching the midnight movie madness revolution of the 1970s. The soundtrack was recorded at Abbey Road Studio and originally released by Apple Records in 1971. The music was composed by Alejandro Jodorowsky with additional input from conductor John Barham. This 1
data.text:
* Audio and tracklist in this preview may differ from the vinyl record. See tracklist for the vinyl record above.
